description: Monitor the observability of [AWS Identity and Access Management service](https://aws.amazon.com/iam/).

environment_variables.description: A name used to retrieve a policy arn, as in `arn:aws:iam::123456789000:policy/AwsIamMonitorTestPolicies/${THIS_NAME}-a_region-awsiam-testpolicy`.
environment_variables.name: METRIST_NAMESPACE

name: AWS Identity and Access Management

steps.description: This step attemps to create a user, randomly named.
This step attemps to create a group, randomly named.
This step attemps to add the newly created user to the newly created group.
This step attemps to remove the user from the group.
This step attemps to delete the group.
This step attemps to attach the user to the given policy arn.
This step attemps to detach the user from the given policy arn.
This step attemps to delete the user created in an earlier step.
